'''"Concrete Halls"''' is a song composed by [[C418]] that plays in [[the Nether]].

== Track description ==
{{C418 agreement}}
[[File:Concrete halls.ogg]]

"Concrete Halls" is an ominous, rhythmic track that consists of dark, relatively dissonant piano chords supported by cold ambient synths, abrasive, heavily [[wikipedia:Reverberation|reverbed]] percussion, and distant [[ghast]] sounds.

=== Raw music files ===
{{IN|je}}, the music files can be found in {{code|[[.minecraft]]/assets/objects}}.{{fn|The files in the <samp>objects</samp> folder are hashed. To locate the music files, see [[Tutorial:Sound directory]].}}

{{IN|be}} and ''[[Minecraft Education]]'', it can be found in:

* Mobile: {{code|[[com.mojang]]/resource_packs/music/vanilla_music/sounds/music/game/nether/}}
* Windows: {{code|%PROGRAMFILES%\WindowsApps\Microsoft.MinecraftUWP_''<version>''_x64_8wekyb3d8bbwe\data\resource_packs\vanilla_music\sounds\music\game\nether}}

All music files are in {{w|Vorbis|Ogg Vorbis}}.
